飲干す: (のみほす) - to drink up; to drain (cup)
飲掛け: (のみかけ) - partially consumed drink; partially consuming a drink
飲掛ける: (のみかける) - to start to drink; to try to drink; to partially drink
飲歩く: (のみあるく) - to go bar-hopping; to go on a pub crawl
飲水量: (いんすいりょう) - amount of drinking
飲泉: (いんせん) - drinking spring water; taking the waters; onsen water used for medical treatment
飲潰す: (のみつぶす) - to drink away one's money; to be a sot
飲茶: (ヤムチャ) - yum cha (chi:); eating snacks (esp. dim sum) with tea
飲薬: (のみぐすり) - oral medicine; internal medicine
飲込む: (のみこむ) - to gulp down/to swallow deeply; to understand/to take in/to catch on to/to learn/to digest; to engulf/to swallow up; to be filled with (people)/to be crowded; to hold back from saying something/to swallow (one's words)
飲逃げ: (のみにげ) - leaving drinks unpaid for
飲酒の害: (いんしゅのがい) - ill effects of drinking
飲酒店: (いんしゅてん) - drinking establishment; bar
飲酒検知器: (いんしゅけんちき) - breathalyser; alcometer
飲酒運転: (いんしゅうんてん) - drunken driving
飲食: (いんしょく) - food and drink; eating and drinking
飲食店: (いんしょくてん) - restaurant; shops serving food and drink
飲食料品: (いんしょくりょうひん) - food and beverage
飲食物: (いんしょくぶつ) - food and drink
飲食禁止: (いんしょくきんし) - no food or drink (e.g. as a sign in a library, etc.); no eating or drinking
飴: (い) - Geleia de arroz, doce (duro), toffee; açúcar de arroz, açúcar feito a partir do amido de arroz, batatas, etc.
飴と鞭: (あめとむち) - carrot and the stick policy
飴坊: (アメンボウ) - pond skater (any insect of family Gerridae); water strider
飴売: (あめうり) - candy vendor (esp. an Edo-period candy vendor who sold candy while walking around playing the flute or another musical instrument); candy vender
飴売り: (あめうり) - candy vendor (esp. an Edo-period candy vendor who sold candy while walking around playing the flute or another musical instrument); candy vender
飴湯: (あめゆ) - thick malt syrup poured into boiling water and sprinkled with cinnamon (used as a refreshing summer drink)
飴煮: (あめに) - food boiled in sugared broth
飴粕: (あめかぜ) - residue (e.g. from sugar cane or beets)
飴細工: (あめざいく) - candy fashioned in human and animal forms
飼いならし: (かいならし) - taming; the taming of
飼いならす: (かいならす) - to tame (e.g. animal); to domesticate
飼い主: (kainushi) - pastor, dono de animal de estimação
飼い慣らし: (かいならし) - taming; the taming of
飼い慣らす: (かいならす) - to tame (e.g. animal); to domesticate
飼い殺し: (かいごろし) - keeping a pet till it dies; keeping a useless person on the payroll
飼い犬に手をかまれる: (かいいぬにてをかまれる) - to be betrayed by a trusted follower
飼い犬に手を噛まれる: (かいいぬにてをかまれる) - to be betrayed by a trusted follower
飼い馴らし: (かいならし) - taming; the taming of
飼い馴らす: (かいならす) - to tame (e.g. animal); to domesticate
飼い鳥: (かいどり) - pet bird; cage bird
飼う: (kau) - manter (um animal de estimação ou outro animal), ter, possuir, criar, cuidar, alimentar
飼兎: (かいうさぎ) - domestic rabbit (variety of European rabbit, Oryctolagus cuniculus)
飼育員: (しいくいん) - caretaker (at a zoo or aquarium); keeper; attendant; breeding staff
飼育室: (しいくしつ) - breeding facility (e.g. lab. animals); breeding room
飼鳥: (かいどり) - pet bird; cage bird
飽かす: (あかす) - to bore/to tire/to weary/to stultify; (often intransitively as 〜に飽かして) to use lavishly (and without regret)
飽かせる: (あかせる) - to bore/to tire/to weary/to stultify; (often intransitively as 〜に飽かせて) to use lavishly (and without regret)
飽きっぽい: (あきっぽい) - fickle; capricious; soon wearied of
飽きる: (akiru) - cansar-se de, perder o interesse em, estar farto de, ter o suficiente
飽き性: (あきしょう) - fickle nature; flighty temperament; inconstant person
飽き易い: (あきやすい) - tired of; wearied; fickle
飽く: (あく) - to tire of/to lose interest in; to be satisfied/to enjoy; (after the -masu stem of a verb) to do adequately
飽くまで: (あくまで) - to the end/to the bitter end/to the last/stubbornly/persistently/consistently/to the utmost; after all/it must be remembered/only/purely/simply
飽くまでも: (あくまでも) - to the last; persistency; thoroughness
